Origin: | Turkish |- ! Meaning: | "Luck", "Lucky" | |- ! Related Names: | Olcayto |} Olcay is a common unisex Turkish given name. In Turkish, "Olcay" means "Luck", and/or "Lucky". People named Olcay include: * Ayşe Olcay Tiryaki, a Turkish physician. * Olcay Çakır, a Turkish female basketball player who plays for Fenerbahçe İstanbul * Olcay Gulsen, Dutch fashion designer. She is owner of the SuperTrash fashion label. * Olcay Neyzi, Turkish doctor. She greatly contributed to improving the level of medical education in Turkey. * Olcay Şahan, Turkish male footballer. * Olcay Çetinkaya, a Turkish male professional footballer. Category:Turkish given names Category:Turkish unisex given names
title: Olcay
